name: Sergey Tikhonov
body:
### whoami
An experienced .NET developer with a willing to make world better. And the one who really thinks that he has abilities to do it. I'm currently living in Moscow, Russia. Russia is really a place that makes you want to make world better, you know. :)

### A Brief Story
I first touched code when I was 13 years old. The first serious programming language was C#. Making experiments through creating simple programs with Windows Forms I got pretty ready to quit middle school after 9th grade to join Moscow University College Of IT. I'm going through the last semester right now and doing my diploma project in full stack JavaScript.

### Skills
TBC.
